descriptionHtml:
This adds the spell Magicka Ward to Skyrim.

This powerful ward blocks spells and breath, absorbing magicka. You lose the benefits of armor while concentrating. It is an Expert level Alteration spell which can be bought and found anywhere you would normally find an Expert Alteration spell tome.


Change Log
v1.00 release!


Install
Extract to Skyrim/Data folder


Uninstall
Delete the following files

Skyrim/Data/Magicka Ward.esp
Skyrim/Data/Meshes/Magic/drakwardbodyfx.nif
Skyrim/Data/Meshes/Magic/drakwardinhandfx.nef
Skyrim/Data/Textures/Effects/Gradients/drakgradwardcolor.dds


Known Bugs
Please let me know if you find any bugs.


Permissions
Contact me if you wish to use this mod in another one.
author: drakshdw
